component.name: getUserPermissionsOnProject
component.description: Gets the details and permissions for a given user on a given project.

component.name: addUserToProject
component.description: Add a user to a project.

component.name: updateUserPermissionOnProject
component.description: Sets the permissions of a given user on a given project.

component.name: removeUserFromProject
component.description: Removes a user from a project.
